name: Two Room To Roam
description: This game is a contribution to the Construct French Game Jam 5. I could only use 24h of the 72 allowed but it works ! The Theme was "Two Rooms". This game was at first made think as a 1 player game but you can use it with a friend as a 2 players hotseat game if you want. This is an Action dexterity game with buffs, and flowers... Yeeehaw !
